content: TE-C JO Joint chisels SDS Plus (TE-C) joint chisels for removing mortar ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Upgraded removal power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Better reliability – these chisel bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Multiple sizes available – helping you to match the chisel to the needs of the job Improved ergonomics – angled tip to simplify precise work around bricks Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Removing mortar between bricks/blockwork Tuck pointing Preparing mortar joints for caulking or seaming For use with SDS Plus (TE-C) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Application: Mortar removal Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Application | Mortar removal | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429800 - Joint chisel TE-C JO 18/0.8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2428757 - Joint chisel TE-C JO 25 - Package Size 1 pc
